welcome to

michael loupa’s spatial

As a result of experimenting with web3,nfts and the metaverse, I developed some nfts to showcase as a proof of concept. My digital arts are also available to collect from various NFT platforms. Experience my digital arts in virtual experiences on my virtual spaces.

Sunset Savannah

A collection of generative AI NFTs on the ethereum blockchain. Telling african stories through generative AI. Collaboration with Savannah Arts.
